actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to make the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands eligible to participate in certain Federal fisheries programs.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Makes the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands eligible to participate in Federal fisheries programs under the Commercial Fisheries Research and Development Act, the Andromous Fish Conservation Act, and other Federal laws.

titles.title: A bill to make the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands eligible to participate in certain Federal fisheries programs.
